title: I received a warrant of debt through forwarded mail. I left Chesapeake, VA last Oct 2016? How can I answer the court?
question: I always pay my credit card debt every month since 2012. Since Oct 2016 I really had a hard time and don't have a job. So I called a debt relief program and started Nov 2016. Until recently I received a mail from a law firm that they are suing me for my debt, and I need to be on court on June 5, but I was out of the country visiting a family. In the letter it stated it was mailed on May 3, 2017. I left CA on May 17 and haven't receive the letter. Only when I came back that I read the letter.
answers: The big question is, were you properly served with a Summons and Complaint? Consult with a Debt Defense lawyer in your area for options.
Were you served with the lawsuit while you were still living in Virginia? Or is the case here in California? Need to know that before I can answer the question.
